statements: SELECT * FROM spacecraft_maintenance_logs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT system_name, maintenance_type FROM spacecraft_maintenance_logs WHERE system_name='Engine';
SELECT * FROM spacecraft_maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type='Checkup' OR maintenance_type='Repair';
SELECT system_name, maintenance_date FROM spacecraft_maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT system_name, maintenance_details FROM spacecraft_maintenance_logs ORDER BY system_name ASC, maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM spacecraft_maintenance_logs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC, system_name ASC;
SELECT system_name, COUNT(log_id) FROM spacecraft_maintenance_logs GROUP BY system_name HAVING COUNT(log_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM spacecraft_maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'routine' AND system_name LIKE 'Engine%' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT system_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM spacecraft_maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type IN ('inspection', 'repair') ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT system_name, MAX(maintenance_date) AS last_maintenance_date FROM spacecraft_maintenance_logs GROUP BY system_name ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT system_name, maintenance_log, system_id FROM spacecraft_systems;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE log_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT system_id, system_name FROM spacecraft_systems WHERE system_id = 3;
SELECT maintenance_description, log_date FROM maintenance_logs WHERE system_id = 1;
SELECT system_name, system_id FROM spacecraft_systems ORDER BY system_id DESC;
SELECT system_id, system_name, maintenance_log FROM spacecraft_systems;
SELECT system_name, maintenance_log, system_id FROM spacecraft_systems;
SELECT maintenance_description, log_date, log_id FROM maintenance_logs;
SELECT log_id, maintenance_description, log_date FROM maintenance_logs;
SELECT system_id, maintenance_log, system_name FROM spacecraft_systems;
SELECT * FROM spacecraft_systems;
SELECT system_name, log_description, date_logged FROM spacecraft_systems;
SELECT log_id, system_name, date_logged FROM spacecraft_systems WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT component_id, component_name, component_status FROM system_components;
SELECT system_name, component_name, last_maintenance_date FROM system_components WHERE component_status = 'Functional';
SELECT system_name, log_description FROM spacecraft_systems;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Engine Tune-up';
SELECT spacecraft_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date, technician_name FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT system_name, COUNT(component_id) AS total_components FROM system_components GROUP BY system_name HAVING total_components > 5;
SELECT system_name, component_name, last_maintenance_date FROM system_components WHERE component_status = 'Needs Maintenance' ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM spacecraft_systems;
SELECT system_name, maintenance_date FROM spacecraft_systems ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT component_name, component_type, last_maintenance_date FROM spacecraft_components WHERE component_type = 'Engine';
SELECT first_name, last_name, role FROM maintenance_personnel WHERE role = 'Technician' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT system_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM spacecraft_systems WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled' ORDER BY maintenance_date;
SELECT * FROM spacecraft_systems;
SELECT system_name, maintenance_type FROM spacecraft_systems WHERE id = 3;
SELECT system_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM spacecraft_systems WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled';
SELECT component_name, component_type, last_maintenance_date FROM spacecraft_components ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, role, contact_info FROM maintenance_personnel WHERE role = 'Engineer';
SELECT * FROM Spacecraft;
SELECT system_name, maintenance_date FROM Spacecraft ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers WHERE role = 'Engineer';
SELECT member_name, experience_years FROM TeamMembers ORDER BY experience_years ASC;
SELECT spacecraft_id, maintenance_type, technician_id FROM MaintenanceLog WHERE technician_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Spacecraft ORDER BY system_name DESC, maintenance_date
SELECT spacecraft_id, system_name, maintenance_date FROM Spacecraft WHERE maintenance_date IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers WHERE experience_years > 5 ORDER BY member_name ASC
SELECT log_id, maintenance_type, technician_id FROM MaintenanceLog WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine' ORDER BY log_id

SELECT Spacecraft.system_name, MaintenanceSchedule.planned_maintenance_date, MaintenanceSchedule.notes FROM Spacecraft JOIN MaintenanceSchedule ON Spacecraft.spacecraft_id = MaintenanceSchedule.spacecraft_id
